name: UICollectionViewFlowLayout
desc: A layout object that organizes items into a grid with optional header and footer views for each section.

items.name: protocol UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout
items.desc: The methods that let you coordinate with a flow layout object to implement a grid-based layout.

items.name: var scrollDirection: UICollectionView.ScrollDirection
items.desc: The scroll direction of the grid.

items.name: enum UICollectionView.ScrollDirection
items.desc: Constants that indicate the direction of scrolling for the layout.

items.name: var minimumLineSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum spacing to use between lines of items in the grid.

items.name: var minimumInteritemSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum spacing to use between items in the same row.

items.name: var itemSize: CGSize
items.desc: The default size to use for cells.

items.name: var estimatedItemSize: CGSize
items.desc: The estimated size of cells in the collection view.

items.name: class let automaticSize: CGSize
items.desc: A placeholder size for self-sizing cells.

items.name: var sectionInset: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The margins used to lay out content in a section.

items.name: var sectionInsetReference: UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference
items.desc: The boundary that section insets are defined in relation to.

items.name: enum UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference
items.desc: Constants that describe the reference point of the section insets.

items.name: var headerReferenceSize: CGSize
items.desc: The default sizes to use for section headers.

items.name: var footerReferenceSize: CGSize
items.desc: The default sizes to use for section footers.

items.name: var sectionHeadersPinToVisibleBounds: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether headers pin to the top of the collection view bounds during scrolling.

items.name: var sectionFootersPinToVisibleBounds: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether footers pin to the bottom of the collection view bounds during scrolling.
